Sentence: Thumb force deficit after lower median nerve block
NER: O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Abstract
NER: O

Sentence: Purpose
NER: O

Sentence: The purpose of this study was to characterize thumb motor dysfunction resulting from simulated lower median nerve lesions at the wrist .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Methods
NER: O

Sentence: Bupivacaine hydrochloride was injected into the carpal tunnel of six healthy subjects to locally anesthetize the median nerve .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Motor function was subsequently evaluated by measuring maximal force production in all directions within the transverse plane perpendicular to the longitudinal axis of the thumb .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Force envelopes were constructed using these measured multidirectional forces .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Results
NER: O

Sentence: Blockage of the median nerve resulted in decreased force magnitudes and thus smaller force envelopes .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: The average force decrease around the force envelope was 27 . 9 % .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: A maximum decrease of 42 . 4 % occurred in a direction combining abduction and slight flexion , while a minimum decrease of 10 . 5 % occurred in a direction combining adduction and slight flexion .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Relative decreases in adduction , extension , abduction , and flexion were 17 . 3 % , 21 . 2 % , 41 . 2 % and 33 . 5 % , respectively .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Areas enclosed by pre - and post - block force envelopes were 20628 + / - 7747 N . N , and 10700 + / - 4474 N . N , respectively , representing an average decrease of 48 . 1 % .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Relative decreases in the adduction , extension , abduction , and flexion quadrant areas were 31 . 5 % , 42 . 3 % , 60 . 9 % , and 52 . 3 % , respectively .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Conclusion
NER: O

Sentence: Lower median nerve lesion , simulated by a nerve block at the wrist , compromise normal motor function of the thumb .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: A median nerve block results in force deficits in all directions , with the most severe impairment in abduction and flexion .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: From our results , such a means of motor function assessment can potentially be applied to functionally evaluate peripheral neuropathies .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Introduction
NER: O

Sentence: The thumb has unique anatomical and biomechanical characteristics that are required to perform many manipulative tasks .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Thumb motor dysfunction resulting from neuromuscular and musculoskeletal pathologies severely hinders the performance of these daily tasks .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Clinical treatment , prevention protocols , and rehabilitation efficacy requires a thorough understanding of thumb motor capabilities , as well as its associated functional deficit .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Investigations of underlying pathological mechanism of the thumb help advance clinical treatments such as tendon transfers [ 1 ] , functional electrical stimulation [ 2 ] and plasticity suppression [ 3 ] .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Measurement of strength during maximum voluntary contraction is a simple and direct means of assessing neuromuscular function .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Popular instruments used for quantitative assessment of thumb strength are pinch dynamometers .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: The pinch output , however , provides limited information about thumb motor function in that it offers a single generic force in one specific direction .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Each muscle / tendon within the thumb has a distinct anatomical origin and insertion , suggesting its external force potential in a particular direction [ 4 - 6 ] .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Hence , evaluation of strengths in multiple directions offers insight concerning the motor capacity of individual muscles .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Force production of a digit has been measured in various directions such as flexion / extension [ 7 , 8 ] , abduction / adduction [ 9 - 14 ] , or in combined directions [ 15 , 16 ] .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Bourbonnais et al . developed an apparatus to measure thumb force production in eight directions in the transverse plane of the thumb and investigated force dependence on the direction of effort [ 15 ] .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Yokogawa and Hara measured index fingertip forces in various directions within the flexion / extension plane [ 8 ] .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Recently , we developed experimental apparatuses to measure multi - directional forces of a digit in its transverse plane [ 17 - 19 ] .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: From these multi - directional forces we constructed force envelopes representative of the characteristic force output pattern of a digit [ 17 - 19 ] .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Disorders resulting from traumatic injuries to and various diseases of these nerves are common in clinical practice .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Clinical manifestations of hand dysfunction are distinctive depending on the nerve involved .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: For example , thenar atrophy is a major clinical observation affecting thumb function at the later stages of compression neuropathy of the median nerve .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Several studies have been conducted to investigate the effects of simulated peripheral neuropathies using local anesthetization [ 5 , 16 , 20 , 21 ] .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Kozin et al .
NER: O O O O

Sentence: [ 21 ] studied the effects of median and ulnar nerve blocks on grip and pinch strength and showed significant decreases following nerve blockage [ 21 ] .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Boatright and Kiebzak [ 20 ] investigated the effects of median nerve block on thumb abduction strength .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Kaufman et al .
NER: O O O O

Sentence: [ 5 ] measured isometric thumb forces in eight directions together with electromyographic signals of thumb muscles after block of the median nerve .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Labosky and Waggy [ 22 ] studied the strength related to grip , pinch , thumb adduction , thumb abduction , and finger flexion after radial nerve block [ 22 ] .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Kuxhaus studied the three dimensional feasible force set at the thumb - tip before and after ulnar nerve block and reported this to be a reproducible and sensitive means to detect impairment .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: The purpose of this study was to utilize our developed apparatus and protocols to investigate the effects of lower median nerve lesion on thumb motor function .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: The lesion was simulated by blocking the median nerve at the wrist using an anesthetic .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: We hypothesized that a median nerve block would cause ( 1 ) a decrease in force production , which would be direction - dependent with the most severe reduction in the abduction direction , and ( 2 ) a decrease in the force envelope area and force quadrant area , with the greatest decrease in the abduction quadrant .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Methods
NER: O

Sentence: Subjects
NER: O

Sentence: Six healthy male subjects ( mean age : 26 . 9 + / - 5 . 1 years ) participated in this study .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: The subjects had no previous history of neuromuscular or musculoskeletal disorders of the upper extremities .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Each subject signed an informed consent form approved by the Institutional Review Board prior to participating in the experiment .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Median nerve block
NER: O O O

Sentence: Injections were performed under aseptic conditions while the subjects sat with the forearm supinated and the wrist slightly extended .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: After the skin at the palmer area of the wrist was cleaned with alcohol , 4 mL of 0 . 5 % bupivacaine hydrochloride ( Astra Pharmaceuticals , Westborough , MA , USA ) was injected into the carpal tunnel with a sterile 25 - gauge short - bevel needle .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: The needle was inserted through the transverse carpal ligament in line with the radial border of the fourth digit slightly ulnar to the palmaris longus tendon at the level of the distal wrist crease .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Forty minutes was allowed for the median nerve block to reach complete effectiveness [ 23 ] and was verified using the Semmes - Weinstein monofilament test .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: The average monofilament score was 2 . 85 across the five digits before nerve block .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: About 40 minutes after nerve injection , little sensory impairment occurred in the ulnar distribution ( score = 3 . 22 ) , while the sensory score in the median distribution was greater than 6 . 15 .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: The effects of nerve block lasted more than 6 hours with all subjects regaining normal hand function within 12 hours .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Testing apparatus
NER: O O

Sentence: The experimental apparatus was designed and constructed to measure maximum voluntary contraction forces of any digit at any point along the digit .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: Force application was possible in any direction within the transverse plane of the longitudinal axis of the digit .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: The apparatus consisted of position control accessories , a force transducer , and a custom fitted aluminum ring attached to the transducer ( Figure 1A , 1B ) .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Sentence: The transducer ( Mini40 , ATI Industrial Automation , NC , USA ) , capable of measuring 6 degrees of freedom forces and moments , was attached to a mounting clamp via an aluminum adapter plate while the aluminum ring was secured to the tool side of the transducer using a custom adapter .
NER: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
